The nova.scheduler.filters.json_filter Module¶

class JsonFilter¶

Bases: nova.scheduler.filters.BaseHostFilter

Host Filter to allow simple JSON-based grammar for selecting hosts.

commands = {'and': <function _and at 0xdaef488>, 'or': <function _or at 0xdaef410>, '>=': <function _greater_than_equal at 0xdaef320>, 'in': <function _in at 0xdaef230>, 'not': <function _not at 0xdaef398>, '<=': <function _less_than_equal at 0xdaef2a8>, '=': <function _equals at 0xdaef0c8>, '<': <function _less_than at 0xdaef140>, '>': <function _greater_than at 0xdaef1b8>}¶
host_passes(host_state, filter_properties)¶

Return a list of hosts that can fulfill the requirements specified in the query.
